top10_new_or_updated.title: UMZH Precision Digital Therapeutics Summer School, 17-21 August 2026, Zurich
top10_new_or_updated.description: What are Precision Digital Therapeutics (PDTx)? How are PDTx designed, evaluated, implemented, scaled, and reimbursed? How can Generative AI make PDTx highly personalized? Digital Therapeutics (DTx) are software-based interventions to manage and treat disease. Precision DTx (PDTx) deliver hyper-personalized interventions at the most relevant and opportune moment [...]
